text: Anata gata no omo ga, adamu no shison no sebone kara kare-ra no shison o toridasa re, kare-ra o mizukara no shonin to nasa reta toki o omoe. (Sonotoki kare wa ose rareta. ) `Ware wa, anata gata no omode wanai ka.' Kare-ra wa moshiageta. `Hai, watashi-tachi wa shogen itashimasu.' Koreha fukkatsu no hi ni anata gata ni,`watashi-tachi wa, kono koto o hontoni chui shimasendeshita.' To iwa senai tamedearu
